name: arachats
description:
simple animation game made with adobe animate

set in a world where humans created a settlement on another planet and have conflict with the native arachats

after a village of arachats is destroyed by a rival group they are stuck between violent arachats, and the balloon army of the human conony

the kan wants to stop the conony once and for all and as their protector you need to guide the arachats to safety and a better world
